SELECT fi.follow_id, fi.user_id, fi.be_user_id, fi.follow_time, su1.user_name, su1.user_avatar, su2.user_name AS be_user_name, su2.user_avatar AS be_user_avatar, fi1.follow_id AS is_follow FROM follow_info fi LEFT JOIN user su1 ON su1.user_id = fi.user_id LEFT JOIN user su2 ON su2.user_id = fi.be_user_id LEFT JOIN ( SELECT follow_id, be_user_id FROM follow_info WHERE delete_flag = 0 AND user_id = #{qry.loginId} ) fi1 ON
fi1.be_user_id = fi.be_user_id
fi1.be_user_id = fi.user_id
WHERE fi.delete_flag = 0
AND fi.user_id = #{qry.userId}
AND fi.be_user_id = #{qry.beUserId}
ORDER BY fi.follow_id DESC

SELECT fi.follow_id, fi.user_id, fi.be_user_id, fi.follow_time, su1.user_name, su1.user_avatar, su2.user_name AS be_user_name, su2.user_avatar AS be_user_avatar FROM follow_info fi LEFT JOIN user su1 ON su1.user_id = fi.user_id LEFT JOIN user su2 ON su2.user_id = fi.be_user_id WHERE fi.delete_flag = 0 AND fi.user_id = #{userId} AND fi.be_user_id = #{beUserId}
